item.title: 根据发布的一份行政备忘录，佛罗里达大学已取消了该校所有的多元化、公平与包容（DEI）职位。

item.title: 周六，又有三个州将举行 2024 年美国共和党总统候选人提名竞选活动。爱达荷州和密苏里州将举行党团会议，而密歇根州将举行党代表大会，为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）之间的争夺颁发代表席位。
item.description:
Saturday sees three more states hold contests in the race for the 2024 GOP presidential nomination. Idaho and Missouri will hold caucuses while Michigan will hold a party convention to award delegates in the fight between Donald Trump and Nikki Haley. https://t.co/HWy9DOhDOX pic.twitter.com/9kgEQxy83B

— ABC News (@ABC) March 2, 2024

item.title: 帝王鲑对阿拉斯加的经济至关重要，但同时也是一群饥饿虎鲸的主要猎物。这就是灾难的根源，渔民们正处于一场法律对决的核心，这场对决有可能会阻止帝王鲑的收获。
item.description:
King salmon are vital to Alaska's economy, but are also the primary prey for a group of starving orcas. It’s a recipe for disaster that has fishermen caught at the heart of a legal showdown that could potentially stop the king salmon harvest. https://t.co/0tDFKoIwT3

item.title: 对于有色人种运动员来说，户外运动的世界是难以进入的。接受一项新运动需要跨越一个又一个障碍--尽管挑战重重，但一项研究发现，冬季运动的参与正慢慢变得更加多样化。
item.description:
The world of outdoor recreation is deceptively inaccessible for athletes of color.

Embracing a new sport requires navigating barrier after barrier — despite the challenges, a study found that winter sports participation is slowly getting more diverse. https://t.co/kLav6f8fM9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 2, 2024
